constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 106 (Thursday, June 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DANNY K. DAVIS of Illinois:
H.R. 3986.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the Constitution and its subsequent amendments
and further clarified and interpreted by the Supreme Court of
the United States.
[Page H2929]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Promoting Employment of Skilled Workers and Foster Youth Act of 2021
